main.name: Sherry Yuan
main.description: I'm a current computer science student at University of Toronto focusing in Artificial Intelligence
main.bio: I am a second year undergraduate student at University of Toronto, pursuing double major in computer science and econimics. I am currently managing a project in finance where se leveraged NLP and sentiment analysis to predict stock prices. In my spare time, I love digital painting and piano!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Quantitative Research Intern
description: - Improved communication with non-technical members of the team through extensive data visualization and written reports.
- Accelerated data filtering process through the implementation of machine learning classifier on political relevance and NLP predictive models on agreement detection

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
